ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_01_10:
Hee hee hee, I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0030_00_ran/0101_0701_02_10:
Come on! Each day of training counts!
You have to give it your best today, too!
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_01_10:
Pokémon that use Psychic-type moves tend to be
a little strange.
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_02_10:
Back in the Hoenn region, I met the Clay Doll
Pokémon Baltoy when I was smaller.
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_03_10:
It didn’t move at all, so I got curious
and decided to keep watching it.
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_04_10:
But then it suddenly let out a loud cry! It was 
like that was a signal or something. A whole 
bunch of Baltoy started gathering around!
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0701_05_10:
I only barely managed to run away before
I got swallowed up in the swarm.
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_01_10:
My Lunatone acts strange sometimes, too.
When it’s a full moon, it starts spinning around
really fast!
ch0030_00_ran/0601_0702_02_10:
I tried to get it to settle down, but it won’t
stop. I wonder what that’s all about.
ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_01_10:
Lunatone is my friend.
It’s been with me for a long time!
ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s really important to me—just like the
moon itself!
ch0030_00_ran/0602_0701_03_10:
It’s so big and pretty!
It’s a wonderful family member to me!
ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_01_10:
Hee hee, Lunatone seems like it’s in a good
mood today!
ch0030_00_ran/0602_0702_02_10:
I don’t need telepathy to tell what it’s
thinking. We’re family after all!
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_01_10: There are lots of things I really like!
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_02_10:
I like Lunatone, of course, and I like you, too.
I like so many things, I can’t count them all!
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_03_10:
But right now, I think I really like Pasio’s
toy stores!
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0701_04_10: Time flies when I visit, even if I’m just looking!
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_01_10:
If I spend too long looking at toys,
sometimes Lunatone gets jealous.
ch0030_00_ran/0603_0702_02_10:
Hee hee, isn’t that silly?
Of course Lunatone is more important than
some silly toy!
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_01_10:
It’s a lot of fun to jump around riding Spoink,
you know?
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_02_10:
Spoink tails are like springs, and they can use
them to jump really high!
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_03_10:
But I need to be careful, ’cause sometimes they
move so quickly I get thrown off!
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0701_04_10:
You need to get the...knack?
Yeah, the knack of it.
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_01_10:
Jumping around with Spoink is fun, but
you can only do it when you’re a kid because
adults are too heavy.
ch0030_00_ran/0604_0702_02_10: I need to make sure I have all the fun I can!
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
can you hear me out?
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_02_10:
These days, I’ve started thinking about you more.
Like, how you’re doing or...
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_03_10: what you’re up to... That sort of thing.
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0701_04_10:
I think that’s why our combination’s getting
better, too!
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_01_10:
Never mind our combination. I just plain enjoy
being around you!
ch0030_00_ran/0605_0702_02_10:
It’s exciting when I think about what adventure
we’ll have together next!
ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a present for you, since you’re always
working so hard!
ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_02_10: I think it’ll be useful to you!
ch0030_00_ran/1701_0701_03_10:
I’m your friend. Of course I can tell 
what kind of thing you want!
ch0030_00_ran/1701_0702_01_10:
I know you’ll use it well.
That gift comes from my heart, after all!
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_01_10:
Tate and I sometimes help out with experiments
at the Mossdeep Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_02_10:
They say our psychic powers are useful for
the experiments they perform.
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_03_10: And so we’re always happy to help out!
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0701_05_10: they buy us toys as rewards!
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m not helping out with the experiments just
for the toys, OK?
ch0030_00_ran/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s just a bonus!
I really just want to help out the people
in the Space Center!
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve always teamed up with Tate till now, but...
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_02_10:
I’ve learned a lot through teaming up with
you, too!
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_03_10:
I always thought that my combination with Tate
was perfect ’cause we were twins.
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_04_10:
But I think I realize now there were a lot of
times when Tate worked to stay in sync with me.
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0701_05_10: Just like how you try to keep in time with me!
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_01_10: Next time, when I team up with Tate again...
ch0030_00_ran/2511_0702_02_10:
I think we’ll be able to show an even more
powerful combination!
ch0030_00_ran/3001_0701_01_10: Good morning! Nice day, isn’t it.
ch0030_00_ran/3003_0701_01_10:
Hello!
Nice weather puts me in such a good mood!
ch0030_00_ran/3004_0701_01_10: Let’s play a lot and battle a lot!
ch0030_00_ran/3005_0701_01_10: Good evening! What a beautiful moon tonight!
ch0030_00_ran/3006_0701_01_10:
I feel the power of the moon
at this time of night.
